content.raw:
I restored the unit tests for the deprecated functions in 4750661 and added warning suppression

I also added `<initial_position>` tags to joint_complete.sdf to confirm that deprecated elements are in fact being parsed, and have observed the deprecation console message from the test:

~~~
[ RUN      ] DOMJointAxis.Complete
Warning [parser.cc:793] SDF Element[initial_position] is deprecated
Warning [parser.cc:793] SDF Element[initial_position] is deprecated
[       OK ] DOMJointAxis.Complete (63 ms)
~~~
content.html:
I restored the unit tests for the deprecated functions in 4750661 and added warning suppression

I also added <initial_position> tags to joint_complete.sdf to confirm that deprecated elements are in fact being parsed, and have observed the deprecation console message from the test:

[ RUN      ] DOMJointAxis.Complete
Warning [parser.cc:793] SDF Element[initial_position] is deprecated
Warning [parser.cc:793] SDF Element[initial_position] is deprecated
[       OK ] DOMJointAxis.Complete (63 ms)
